models.cards

Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • models.cards.Card

  • public abstract class Card
extends java.lang.Object
    Top Card class.

    Create a default Card having a type and some families.
    This type is used to get the card name as same family cards can be different depending on the Card subclasses.
    The family type is used to recognize cards inferring on the same theme : CardFamily.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Simon RENOULT
